touchdown: ^Your ship touches down. This is it - the Port of Nevosis.

^The door of your ship opens and a lithe, anxious seeming middle aged man rushes to your door, followed by a small flock of people. They turn to the ship, gawking at it's side, where the words "Trailway Railways & Trade" are boldly painted on the side.
^"Wendy!! Wendy, how are you, how was the airspace, how are you doing - it is absolutely WONDEROUS to see you."

s: ^"Hello there Digby. I see you are energetic as always!"

g-3: ^"Did you sleep well? Can I get you anything? A bucket of water, perhaps -"

s: ^"Digby, I am quite weary from travels and we have much to discuss before I call it a night. Shall we head in?"

speaking_of_earth_snacks: ^Digby tells you about city1 and discusses their interest in Earth snacks. You continue on to the next city with this knowledge.
city1_complete: ^city1 is now complete for trade! And you are ready to go.
